casebody.data:
No. 10-6277. Billy Thomas Pearson, Petitioner v. Joel Herron, Correctional Administrator, Scotland Correctional Institution. 562 U.S. 1031, 131 S. Ct. 570, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8747.

178 L. Ed. 2d 417,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 381 Fed. Appx. 288.
